text:
Flexible cystoscopy as an adjunct to extracorporeal shockwave lithotripsy.
 Ancillary procedures associated with extracorporeal shockwave lithotripsy (ESWL) include placement and subsequent removal of double pigtail ureteric stents.
 A simple new technique has been developed for the insertion of these stents.
 Using the flexible cystoscope, the procedure is performed on an out-patient basis under local anaesthesia.
 Placement of the stents was successful in 30/34 patients and removal was successful in 14/14 patients.
